item.title: Shaped by the language you use
item.description: A few months ago I did an astonishing discovery, namely how strong your solutions are shaped by the programming language you use, the language that lives in your head. The interesting thing is that I already knew this. But despite that, I hadn’t expected this to be so incredibly influencing until I saw such a clear case of this in my own work. The right tool for the right job First a short explanation of my programming background.
